post.description: Authenticate user and return access token.
Log out user by clearing cookie.

schema.title: Response Logout Api Auth Logout Post

get.description: Get current user info.

schema.title: Response Read Users Me Api Auth Me Get

get.description: Dev-only: Auto-login as admin for testing.
Get current site settings. Returns defaults if not configured (TA-0001).

post.description:
Schedule content for publishing (TA-0026).

Creates a publish job with idempotency check.

delete.description:
Unschedule (cancel) a publish job (TA-0026).

Only queued jobs can be cancelled.

schema.title: Response Unschedule Content Api Admin Schedule Schedule  Job Id  Delete

put.description:
Reschedule a publish job to a new time.

Only queued jobs can be rescheduled.

get.description: Get a publish job by ID.

Get all scheduled jobs for a content item.

Returns pending jobs (queued, running, retry_wait).

schema.title: Response Get Jobs For Content Api Admin Schedule Schedule Content  Content Id  Get

post.description:
Publish content immediately (TA-0033).

Creates a job for now and immediately executes it.

Manually trigger processing of due jobs.

For testing and manual intervention.

schema.title: Response Run Due Jobs Api Admin Schedule Run Due Jobs Post

get.description:
Get scheduled jobs for calendar display (TA-0031).

Returns jobs within the specified date range formatted for calendar UI.

Args:
    start: Start of date range (UTC)
    end: End of date range (UTC)
    status: Optional filter by status (queued, running, completed, failed)

Returns:
    CalendarResponse with events list

Get aggregated totals for a time range (TA-0041).

Returns total counts split by real/bot traffic.

Get time series data for charting (TA-0041).

Returns data points with timestamps and counts.

Get top content by views (TA-0042).

Returns content IDs sorted by view count.

Get top traffic sources (TA-0042).

Returns UTM sources sorted by view count.

Get top referrer domains (TA-0042).

Returns referrer domains sorted by view count.

Get complete dashboard data (TA-0041, TA-0042, E14).

Returns totals, time series, top content, sources, referrers, and engagement.

Get engagement totals for a time range (E14).

Returns total and engaged session counts.

Get engagement distribution by time and scroll buckets (E14).

Returns counts per bucket combination.

Get top content by engaged sessions (E14).

Returns content IDs sorted by engaged session count.

Query audit logs with filters (TA-0049).

Returns paginated list of audit entries.

Get recent audit logs (TA-0049).

Returns entries from the last N hours.

Get audit history for a specific entity (TA-0049).

Returns all audit entries for the entity.

Get audit logs for a specific actor (TA-0049).

Returns all actions performed by the actor.

Get a specific audit entry by ID (TA-0049).

Returns the audit entry or 404 if not found.

Get audit log summary statistics (TA-0049).

Returns counts by action and entity type.

schema.title: Response Get Audit Summary Api Admin Audit Stats Summary Get

get.description: List all links.

List all redirects.

post.description:
Create a new redirect.

Validates:
- TA-0043: No loops
- TA-0044: Internal targets only
- TA-0045: Chain length <= 3

put.description:
Update a redirect.

Validates same constraints as create.

schema.title: Response Delete Redirect Api Admin Redirects Redirects  Redirect Id  Delete

Resolve a redirect path.

Returns the final target and status code after following chains.

schema.title: Response Resolve Redirect Api Admin Redirects Redirects Resolve  Path  Get

post.description:
Validate all existing redirects.

Returns any redirects with validation issues.

schema.title: Response Validate Redirects Api Admin Redirects Redirects Validate Post

get.description: List newsletter subscribers with pagination and optional status filter.
Get details of a specific subscriber.

delete.description: Permanently delete a subscriber and all their data.

Get subscriber statistics by status.

schema.title: Response Get Newsletter Stats Api Admin Newsletter Stats Get

get.description: List all PDF resources.

schema.title: Response List Resources Api Admin Resources Get

post.description: Create a new PDF resource draft (TA-0014).

post.description: Set pinned policy for a resource (TA-0015).

get.description: List all content items for admin.

schema.title: Response List Content Api Content Get

get.description: Get a specific content item.
List all assets.

schema.title: Response List Assets Api Assets Get

get.description: Get asset file content.

post.description:
Set a specific version as the latest for an asset.

Spec refs: E2.3, TA-0012, TA-0013

This allows admins to rollback the /latest pointer to a previous version,
ensuring stable versioned URLs while enabling flexibility in what /latest serves.

get.description: List all users (admin only).

schema.title: Response List Users Api Users Get

get.description: Get public home page data: latest posts and links.

schema.title: Response Get Public Home Api Public Home Get

get.description: Get published content by slug.

Get related articles for a content item (TA-0097-0099).

Returns recent published articles, excluding the current content.

schema.title: Response Get Related Articles Api Public Content  Content Id  Related Get

get.description:
Get public site settings.

Returns site configuration that is safe to expose to unauthenticated visitors:
- site_title: Display name of the site
- site_subtitle: Tagline/description
- theme: Default theme preference (light/dark/system)
- social_links_json: Social media links for footer

Does NOT return sensitive fields like avatar_asset_id or internal configuration.

post.description: Generate a platform-specific share URL with UTM tracking parameters.

get.description: Get list of supported sharing platforms.

post.description: Start the double opt-in subscription flow. Sends confirmation email.

get.description: Confirm subscription via token from confirmation email.
Unsubscribe via token from newsletter emails.

Resolve a redirect path (Public).
Returns {"target": url, "status_code": code} or 404.

schema.title: Response Resolve Redirect Endpoint Api Public Redirects Resolve Get

get.description: Server-side rendered homepage with meta tags (TA-0003, TA-0004).
Server-side rendered post page with meta tags.
Server-side rendered static page with meta tags.
Get SSR metadata as JSON (for testing TA-0003, TA-0004).

schema.title: Response Get Ssr Metadata Meta Get

get.description: Server-side rendered PDF resource page (E3.2, TA-0016, TA-0017, TA-0018).
Sitemap for search engines (R2, T-0046). Only published content included.
Serve asset by version ID with immutable cache headers (TA-0009, TA-0010).
Serve latest version of asset (shorter cache).

post.description:
Ingest an analytics event.

TA-0034: Validates event type and allowed fields.
TA-0035: Rejects forbidden fields (PII).

Rate limited: 600 requests per 60 seconds per client.

Ingest multiple analytics events.

Returns results for each event.

schema.title: Response Ingest Batch A Batch Post
